name: Into Hinterland World
overview: Another game to add to a long list of C64 designed shoot em ups, as we've recently been told by Saberman that Abyss Connection has released a brand new shoot em up called ' Into Hinterland World ' for the C64! This game featuring smooth side scrolling graphics, pits your ship against many enemies, as you must guide your ship through time to analyze gene-material from all geographical eras to save mankind from total extinction. In this game you fly across a number of time zones and must to destroy as many enemies as possible for an ever higher score. Along the way you'll be able to collect energy pods which according to the game description will protect your armoury and the entire mission. The game features challenging levels, plenty of enemies to keep you busy, power ups, colourful graphics and a great soundtrack!
